name: Transparent Red Lego Flower
description: An everlasting lego rose with a beautiful, glassy look to express your deep feelings for someone.

name: Pink Lego Flower
description: A lego pink rose for the sweetest person in your life forevermore.

name: Blue Lego Flower
description: A lego blue rose for someone with eternal elegance.

name: Pink/Blue Lego Flower
description: A lego rose for someone with eternal elegance.

name: Purple Foil Flower
description: Ethereal and iridescent. These flowers feature a holographic foil finish that shimmers and changes shades as they move in the light. Available in Mystery Purple, they add a magical, dreamy vibe to any arrangement.

name: White Foil Flower
description: Ethereal and iridescent. These flowers feature a holographic foil finish that shimmers and changes shades as they move in the light. Available in Pearlescent White, they add a magical, dreamy vibe to any arrangement.

name: Purple/White Foil Flower
description: Ethereal and iridescent. These flowers feature a holographic foil finish that shimmers and changes shades as they move in the light. Available in Mystery Purple/Pearlescent White, they add a magical, dreamy vibe to any arrangement.

name: Yellow Crochet Flower
description: A cheerful yellow crochet flower that radiates warmth and happiness.

name: Red Crochet Flower
description: A vibrant red crochet flower symbolizing love and passion.

name: Red/Yellow Crochet Flower
description: A vibrant crochet flower symbolizing love and passion.

name: Couple Keychain
description: An adorable Chiikawa magnetic keychain set for cute pairs that sticks together when close. Puppy love, literally. Two distinct dog designs that share a magnetic connection. Perfect for couples or besties who want a low-key but matching accessory for their bags or keys.

name: Chiikawa Magnetic Couple Keychain
description: An adorable Chiikawa magnetic keychain set for cute pairs that sticks together when close.

name: Dog Magnetic Couple Keychain
description: Puppy love, literally. Two distinct dog designs that share a magnetic connection. Perfect for couples or besties who want a low-key but matching accessory for their bags or keys.

name: Tangled Couple Bracelet
description: Premium Pick. Inspired by the "new dream" of Rapunzel and Flynn. These woven bracelets feature intricate detailing and a design that symbolizes an unbreakable, adventurous bond.

name: Couple Bracelet
description: Balance in harmony. A classic set featuring black and white cords with the Yin & Yang charms. Represents two opposites that complete each other perfectly. Sweet and subtle. One bracelet features a cute Bear charm, the other a Rabbit. It's the ultimate "soft couple" aesthetic accessory.

name: Yin and Yang Couple Bracelet
description: Balance in harmony. A classic set featuring black and white cords with the Yin & Yang charms. Represents two opposites that complete each other perfectly.

name: Bear and Rabbit Couple Bracelet
description: Sweet and subtle. One bracelet features a cute Bear charm, the other a Rabbit. It's the ultimate "soft couple" aesthetic accessory.

name: Clamps
description: Clamps that add a playful floral touch to your hair or accessories.

name: Acrylic Flower Clamps
description: Clear acrylic flower clamps that add a playful floral touch to your hair or accessories.

name: Pink Flower Clamps
description: Pink flower hair clamps for a soft and feminine look.

name: Blue Flower Clamps
description: Blue flower hair clamps that add a cool and stylish accent.

name: Purple Flower Clamps
description: Purple flower hair clamps for an elegant pop of color.

name: Red Cassette Recorder
description: This isn't just a toy—it's a mini voice recorder! Record a short, sweet message (like "I love you" or a funny inside joke) that plays back when the button is pressed. A retro way to speak your heart.

description: This isn't just a toy—it's a mini voice recorder! Record a short, sweet message (like "I love you" or a funny inside joke) that plays back when the button is pressed. A retro way to speak your heart.

name: Light Blue & Blue Octopus Reversible Plushie
description: What's your mood today? These viral plushies flip inside out to reveal a different color. Soft, squishy, and perfect for cuddling.

name: Blue & Pink Octopus Reversible Plushie
description: What's your mood today? These viral plushies flip inside out to reveal a different color. Soft, squishy, and perfect for cuddling.

name: Red/White/Pink Rose
description: The universal symbol of love, reimagined to last forever. Each rose features tightly woven petals that mimic the unfolding beauty of a fresh bloom. Whether you are building a romantic bouquet or just need a single stem to say "I care," this timeless classic is the perfect centerpiece.

description: The universal symbol of love, reimagined to last forever. Each rose features tightly woven petals that mimic the unfolding beauty of a fresh bloom. Whether you are building a romantic bouquet or just need a single stem to say "I care," this timeless classic is the perfect centerpiece.

name: Light Pink/Pomelo/Two-Toned Carnation
description: Soft, textured, and full of charm. These carnations capture the intricate, ruffled look of the real thing without ever wilting. Symbolizing fascination and gratitude, they add a wonderful depth and "fluffiness" to any arrangement, making your bouquet look fuller and more detailed.

name: Pink/Yellow Tulip
description: Sleek, sophisticated, and gracefully tall. Our premium tulips are designed for those who prefer a minimalist, modern aesthetic. With their clean lines and smooth silhouette, these blooms act as the "tall girl" of the group, adding elegance and height that instantly elevates the value of your bundle.

name: Pink Tulip
description: Sleek, sophisticated, and gracefully tall. Our premium tulips are designed for those who prefer a minimalist, modern aesthetic. With their clean lines and smooth silhouette, these blooms act as the "tall girl" of the group, adding elegance and height that instantly elevates the value of your bundle.

description: Sleek, sophisticated, and gracefully tall. Our premium tulips are designed for those who prefer a minimalist, modern aesthetic. With their clean lines and smooth silhouette, these blooms act as the "tall girl" of the group, adding elegance and height that instantly elevates the value of your bundle.

name: Yellow/Pink Gerbera
description: Bold, bright, and impossible to ignore. With its wide, open face and intricate center details, the Gerbera is the "sunshine" of any arrangement. It is larger than our standard blooms, making it a fantastic statement piece that adds immediate volume and a happy, playful energy to your bundle.

name: Yellow Gerbera
description: Bold, bright, and impossible to ignore. With its wide, open face and intricate center details, the Gerbera is the "sunshine" of any arrangement. It is larger than our standard blooms, making it a fantastic statement piece that adds immediate volume and a happy, playful energy to your bundle.

name: Blue/Lavender Carnation
description: The perfect accent to complete the look. This premium bloom offers a unique shape and texture that breaks the monotony of standard round flowers. Whether used as a secondary focal point or a high-end filler, it bridges the gap between the foliage and the centerpiece, giving your bouquet a professionally styled, cohesive finish.

name: Blue Carnation
description: The perfect accent to complete the look. This premium bloom offers a unique shape and texture that breaks the monotony of standard round flowers. Whether used as a secondary focal point or a high-end filler, it bridges the gap between the foliage and the centerpiece, giving your bouquet a professionally styled, cohesive finish.

name: Rose Bouquet
description: The ultimate gesture of romance and love. This bouquet features three of our tightly woven, focal Roses. It's a timeless arrangement that looks elegant in any color combination. Perfect for dates, anniversaries, or just to make someone feel special.

name: Carnation Bouquet
description: Soft, fluffy, and full of charm. This bouquet highlights the intricate ruffled layers of three Carnations. It offers a "fuller" look than the  and feels sweet and friendly. A great choice for best friends, mothers, or "congratulations" gifts.

name: Tulip Bouquet
description: Sleek, sophisticated, and modern. This bouquet features three of our tall Premium Tulips. With their clean lines and smooth silhouette, this arrangement offers a "Korean-style" aesthetic that stands out from the crowd.

name: Just Stick Around Bundle
description: Cute, colorful, and impossible to resist! This playful bundle combines a trio of our handcrafted blooms with a soft, squishy octopus plushie. It is the perfect "little something" to make someone smile—flowers they can keep forever and a plushie to hug when they miss you.

name: Yours Everyday Bundle
description: Wear your heart on your sleeve—literally. This set steps it up with four beautiful focal flowers and a pair of magnetic couple bracelets. Whether you choose the balanced "Yin Yang" or the adorable "Bear & Rabbit," this bundle is all about connection.

name: Valentina's Bundle
description: A gift that speaks (or sings) volumes. This mixed bouquet features the elegance of a tall Tulip framed by two classic blooms. Paired with a special Audio keepsake, this bundle is designed for sentimental moments where words—and lyrics—matter most.

name: The Konvy Bundle
description: The ultimate self-care treat! We've partnered with Konvy to bring you a "Beauty & Blooms" package. It features a stunning handcrafted bouquet alongside a complete makeup essential kit. Perfect for the girl who loves to look good and feel appreciated. Grab it before it's gone!

name: 2 Large Stickers
description: Celebrate your connections with our collection of whimsical, heart-warming stickers. This bundle allows you to pick any two of our large, high-quality designs—perfect for personalizing your laptop, water bottle, or journal!
